name="orderId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Image"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="url" type="xs:string"/> type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ImagesGroup"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="originalImage" type="tns:Image"/> <xs:element name="standardImage" type="tns:Image"/> <xs:element name="thumbImage" type="tns:Image"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="RegistrationData"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="fullname" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Info"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> name="follows" type="xs:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="comment" type="xs:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="productSelling" type="tns:Product" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="productSold" type="tns:Product" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="productBought" type="tns:Product" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="rank" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="mobileNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="address" type="tns:Address" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element name="credentials" type="tns:UserCredentials"/> <xs:element
